renderpass.code: #define mainImage(f,w) float C,S,x=1.; f.z++; vec4 p = vec4(w,0,1)/iResolution.yyxy-.5, d=p, P,X=texture(iChannel0,vec2(0.)); p.z--; mat2 F = mat2( C=cos(iTime), S=sin(iTime), -S, C ); for (C=x; C>0.; C-=.03) if(x>.1) {P=p;P.xy*=F;P.yz*=F;x = length( vec2( length(P.xz) - X.x*.7, P.y ) );f.y=C*C;f.x=C;p -= d*x;}
renderpass.name: Image
